Name: Fortress V2
About the game: Various characters Fortress V2 offers a number of tanks with unique personalities and strengths. Know the characteristics of each tank and choose a tank that suits your game playing style Fire with your teams! Choose your tank and combine it with your team to unleash critical attacks on your opponents. Strategic play The terrain changes in real time by the bomb shots. Know the characteristics of your tanks and work with your teammates to discover new tactics and combinations to respond appropriately to changing terrain.
